vulnerability_findings.name: timestamp
vulnerability_findings.message:
KingOfTheEtherThrone.claimThrone (patch_1.sol#52-101) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- currentMonarch.etherAddress != wizardAddress (patch_1.sol#68-70)

vulnerability_findings.name: external-function
vulnerability_findings.vulnerability_code:
function numberOfMonarchs() public view returns (uint n) {
        return pastMonarchs.length;

vulnerability_findings.name: naming-convention
vulnerability_findings.message: Parameter '_name' of KingOfTheEtherThrone.claimThrone (patch_1.sol#52) is not in mixedCase

vulnerability_findings.message: Parameter '_amount' of KingOfTheEtherThrone.sweepCommission (patch_1.sol#103) is not in mixedCase
